markdownContent:
You express your thanks to Frederic, who is thrilled that something he did had an immediate effect. «When you only worry about, where to put stuff in the collection, this feeling is really rare. It's some work, which has no end… Apropos end, you should be done with your first day at work soon, right? You know what, how about I invite you for a beer? Sounds good? Great! I'll just to quickly check something up with Laura and then we're good to go! Just wait here, and I'll be back soon.» Frederic takes of flyingly and you remain alone in the collection.

Suddenly, your phone buzzes.
